column1: Trump … the governors are lying ... the US is NOT RESPONSIBLE ... ‘we'll HELP’ ... but it is up to the states to supply the testing ... the US IS NOT PROVIDING THE TESTING mcConnell said if the STATES spend too much money fighting the Corona Virus …. Let them go bankrupt

MIT study: Subways a 'major disseminator' of coronavirus in NYC This is not rocket science.
